Scenario: Citizen tracks school resource distribution equity
    Given the citizen is concerned about educational equity
    And lives in a diverse municipality
    When the Observer analyzes district resource patterns
    Then the citizen sees which schools get experienced teachers
    And views facility quality across neighborhoods
    And identifies program access disparities (gifted, AP, arts)
    And understands systematic resource distribution patterns
    And educational justice concerns become evidence-based
